title: Retching
data:
{{obsolete}}
'''Retching''' is a [[status effect]] which prevents you from [[eat]]ing [[food]] or [[quaff]]ing [[potion]]s. At present, the only source of retching is the attack of a [[plague shambler]].

==History==
[[Plague shambler]]s, the only source of retching in the game, were removed in [[0.15]].

Retching was added in [[0.13]]

[[Category:Status effects]]
